g.text: sends a request to make an order
shows the list of the pharmacies
chooses which products and which quantities to order
[until there is no more products to add]
shows the list of the available products
chooses which product and which quantity to order
asks if the user is done adding more products
confirms that there is not more products
newOrder(address, amount, additionalFee, dateOrder, description, mapProducts)
order = addOrder(amount, additionalFee, dateOrder, description, mapProducts, client, streetName,doorNumber,locality,country,longitude,longitude)
create(amount, additionalFee, dateOrder, description, mapProducts, client, streetName,doorNumber,locality,country,longitude,longitude)
validates, presents the order and asks for a confirmation
registers the order and informs of the success of the operation
